select u.u_id as u_id, u.u_name as u_name, u.u_tel as u_tel, u.address as address, u.account_balance as account_balance, tmp.meter_no as meter_no, tmp.read_time as read_time, tmp.read_value as read_value, tmp.state as state, tmp.meter_type as meter_type from ( select u_id, u_name, u_tel, address, account_balance from t_user u where u_id = #{uid} ) u left join( select meter_no as meter_no, read_time as read_time, read_value as read_value, state as state, 0 as meter_type, u_id as u_id from t_watermeter where u_id = #{uid} union all select ammeter_no as meter_no, read_time as read_time, read_value as read_value, state as state, 1 as meter_type, u_id as u_id from t_ammeter where u_id = #{uid} ) tmp on u.u_id = tmp.u_id
